name: overearnest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
too serious and determined, especially so serious that you are unable to find your own actions funny: She's an over-earnest director who's made a handful of second-rate films. His novels could sometimes be over-earnest.
More examplesFewer examplesAn over-earnest presenter was asking her increasingly dull questions.I got stuck talking to an overearnest academic.She plays the over-earnest daughter of a British family visiting the Dordogne.Critics describe his plays as over-earnest.The overearnest dancer droned on about her partner for so long that I wanted to fall asleep.
